Description.Text:
Apartment Amenities
• Free high-speed Wi-Fi Internet
• Free phone calls within North America
• Television with premium channels in the living room and one bedroom
• DVD player and entertainment system
• Heat and air conditioning
• Fully equipped kitchen
• Microwave, dishwasher and coffee maker
• Alarm clock / CD player / iPod dock
• Hair dryer, iron and ironing board
• Luxury linens, sheets and towels
• Starter supply of toiletries
General Description
Close proximity to a beach.
Major attractions located nearby
Local Attractions
The Beach - 5 minutes
Zoo Miami - 35 minutes
Science Museum - 17 minutes
Services
Elevators
Self Laundry
Accommodations
High-speed internet access
Cable/satellite television channels
Policies
Check in location: 24-hour concierge desk in building lobby
All SCA apartments have a strict no-smoking policy (there is a $500 minimum charge for violating this policy) and pets are not allowed inside at any time. Lost keys will incur a fee of $50 per key set to have replacements made.
All SCA properties are self-service. SCA is responsible for full housekeeping services before each new arrival and after every departure. Guests are responsible for their own housekeeping and laundry during their stay, including trash disposal and recycling, unless other arrangements are made.
Infrequently, an apartment that has been reserved for you may become unavailable because of factors outside our control, such as plumbing issues, electrical outages, and the like. In such cases, the Property manager will offer you alternative accommodations in another apartment of equal or higher quality.
Guests may check in from 3:00 PM onwards on their arrival date and must check out by 11:00 AM on the day of their departure. If due to travel times, you are arriving early or are departing late, you may come to our local office, where you can store your luggage and use the facilities as needed. You must coordinate luggage storage and use of the lounge with an office staff member in advance.
Rooms
Max Occupancy : 2 Bedroom= 4 people
Close to major attractions and city excitement; we invite you to be our guest
